Bloodstone (opaque dark gray with red flecks)/Carnelian (opaque orange to red-brown)/Chalcedony (opaque white)/Chrysoprase (translucent green)/Citrine (transparent pale yellow-brown)/Jasper (opaque blue, black, or brown)/Moonstone (translucent white with pale blue glow)/Onyx (opaque bands of black and white, or pure black or white)/Quartz (transparent white, smoky gray, or yellow)/Sardonyx (opaque bands of red and white)/Star rose quartz (translucent rosy stone with white star-shaped center)/Zircon (transparent pale blue-green)/A Deed to a Ruined House/Palm-Sized Smoky Glass Sphere/Multicolored Glowing Stone Disk/Signet Ring of a Low Noble Family/A Vial of Quicksilver/Brass Orb etched with strange runes/Platinum Ring
